turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hello, Could you order the coffee for starbucks or peets?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Yeah, could you tell me the your exact location

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes i am from new york city. any starbucks coffee shop available.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Yes, near by newyork. May I take your order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes. I'd like the flat white order of coffee.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Would you like something for dessert?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, I'll have the another coffee, please. Would you like something?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: No thanks. I'm full.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: can you add a little with chocolate syrup added

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hot, milk with sweet flavor added little.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: how much price for coffee

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: These usually cost around $0.50 and are good additions if you like sweet drinks

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: May I take your order?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Yes when i get my order and tell me some information.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes wait it take little time

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Could we have the check, please?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, here it is.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Hmm. $23.55. Here you are.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank you. any help for you

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: no thanks
